name: react-ts-demo
description: babel with webpack and React and typescript demo files for npm-notes

scripts.test: echo "No test specified yet. Check out later info on jest." && exit 1
scripts.dev: if [ ! -z "$npm_config_port" ]; then webpack-dev-server --config wp.config.js --mode development --port $npm_config_port; else npm run dev --port=$npm_package_config_port; fi

author: JR-Mitchell
